text: Scrimmage (alteration of skirmish) may refer to: * An exhibition game, an informal sports contest or practice match which does not go on the regular season record * Line of scrimmage, in American football and related games * Scrimmage vest, clothing used in practices as a substitute for a sports uniform * USS Scrimmage (AM-297), a U.S. Navy minesweeper built during World War II * Scholastic Scrimmage, a high school quiz bowl game show televised in Pennsylvania, US * Skirmish football a variation of American football skirmishfootball.com ==See also== * Scrum (rugby) * Scrim (disambiguation)
title: Scrimmage
